verses.roman:
prabhura sevā karite purī ājñā dila
ataeva prabhu iṅhāke nikaṭe rākhila

synonyms: prabhura—of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; sevā—the service; karite—to perform; purī—Īśvara Purī; ājñā dila—ordered; ataeva—therefore; prabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; iṅhāke—him; nikaṭe—by His side; rākhila—kept.
translation: "Īśvara Purī ordered Govinda to serve Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu. Thus the Lord keeps him by His side."
